mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contract ( user_id, contract_name, lessor_name, lessee_name, address, land_category, land_area, building_usage, building_area, leased_part, leased_area, deposit, down_payment, balance, maintenance_cost, lease_start, lease_end ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{contractName}, #{lessorName}, #{lesseeName}, #{address}, #{landCategory}, #{landArea}, #{buildingUsage}, #{buildingArea}, #{leasedPart}, #{leasedArea}, #{deposit}, #{downPayment}, #{balance}, #{maintenanceCost}, #{leaseStart}, #{leaseEnd} )
